segments.text: Guess what came in the mail today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My acceptance letter to Yale !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! Congratulation ! When do classes start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Freshman orientation is the last week of august , but I want to go two weeks before that to get settled in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re so lucky ! Do you have to do many things before you leave ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I ’ ll be very busy ! I have to get a visa , buy a plane ticket , and pack my things . But first , I want to register for classes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When can you do that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , they sent me their prospectus , so I can start looking now . do you want to help me decide which classed to take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What can you choose from ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I have to take all the fundamental course , plus a few from my major .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is your major ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope to major in English literature , but the admissions counselor told me that many people change their major many times in their first year , so we ’ ll see .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are the fundamental course ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In order to graduate , every student must take a certain amount of classes in history , math , English , philosophy , science and art .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Interesting . That ’ s very different from the Chinese education system .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . It ’ s also very different from the British education system .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , sure . In British , students don ’ t have to take the foundation course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: why not ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: maybe because they think they know everything already ! ha ha .
segments.speaker: S1
